content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0.5, 6.0)
Consists of boiler (position 0.5, 6.0) and steam engine (position 0.5, 0.5). The boiler is intended to convert water into steam using coal, while the steam engine converts steam into electricity.

### Copper plate factory at position(-5.0, -65.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position -5.0, -65.0) which is currently full and producing iron plates from iron ore.
- Burner mining drill (position 47.0, -82.0) extracting iron ore and a wooden chest (position 46.5, -83.5) storing coal.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing Offshore Pump
- Cannot place Offshore Pump as it is not in inventory. Ensure that the Offshore Pump is available in the inventory before attempting to place it.

### Errors when connecting Boiler to Steam Engine
- No pipes available. Ensure to have pipes in inventory to connect the Boiler to the Steam Engine.

### Errors with furnace inventory
- The furnace source is full and the furnace result is full. Regularly check and manage the inventory of furnaces to prevent them from becoming full and ceasing operations.
